project.name: C-C127B-SUBV-05-ST01-DT03-DF05-CF22-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to the function definition. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C127B-SUBV-05-ST01-DT03-DF05-CF22-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: create a repository Has a heap buffer of size 64. Reads in an ascii string from an environment variable and copies the final 63 characters into the heap buffer. Then reads the variable back from the heap buffer in reverse order, but incorrectly uses the size of the original string. If the original string is longer than 63characters, this will result in an underread.

scoring_formula.formula: STDOUT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

process.environment_variable: This is probably not going to overflow a buffer of some sort.

process.script: cd ../good-02 && cp file.txt stonesoup && cd stonesoup && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/svn add file.txt

scoring_formula.formula: CHECKOUT AND ADD AND COMMIT AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
